Entry.JapaneseText: あの娘に話を聞けばクレアの事も わかるかもしれない……
Entry.EnglishText: We might find out what's going on with Claire if we talk to that girl...

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ、<Blue>王の盾<White>の目的も聞きたいところだ。 庇女が隠れていそうな場所を探そう。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, I'd like to inquire about the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>'s objectives as well. Let's find where she may be hiding.
